sentences.sentence: We weigh ourselves down until we can't even move and make no mistake. Moving is living.
sentences.translation: 我们不断给自己增重，直到寸步难行。我们绝不允许犯错。移动就是生命。

sentences.sentence: Believe you can and you're half way there.
sentences.translation: 相信你能行，你就成功了一半。

sentences.sentence: Optimists are right. Pessimists are right. It’s up to you to choose which you will be.
sentences.translation: 乐观者是对的，悲观者也没错，你自己决定你想成为哪种人。

sentences.sentence: And the more we try to understand one another, the more exceptional each of us will be.
sentences.translation: 我们越是努力理解他人，自身也越发变得优秀。

sentences.sentence: There are but two roads that lead to an important goal and to the doing of great things: strength and perseverance.
sentences.translation: 世间只有两条路能够使人达成重大目标或完成伟业，那就是力量和坚持不懈。
